thread.title: BRIEF-Neonode Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.01

title: BRIEF-Neonode Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
in 7 minutes BRIEF-Neonode Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.01 Reuters Staff
May 8 (Reuters) - Neonode Inc:
* NEONODE REPORTS FIRST QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $2.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.4 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.02 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ON JAN 1, 2018, NEONODE ADOPTED THE NEW REVENUE RECOGNITION STANDARD ASC 606
* NEONODE - NET IMPACT OF ADOPTION OF ASC 606 IS A $0.2 MILLION REDUCTION IN TOTAL LICENSE FEE REVENUES REPORTED IN QUARTER VERSUS USING THE OLD ACCOUNTING STANDARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
